title: Do 10 Nigerians die from cancer every hour?
subtitle: A health reporter claims at least 10 Nigerians die from cancer every hour. Does this figure accurately depict cancer’s toll in Nigeria?
author: africacheck.org
vclaim:
• None To emphasise a need for better care, a reporter said 10 Nigerians die from cancer every hour.
• None The most recent data suggests the rate is eight cancer deaths an hour.
• None But data on cancer deaths in Nigeria is unreliable, and the toll could be higher.

Is Ake correct about the number of cancer deaths in Nigeria?

The reporter told Africa Check he “got the statistic from an expert”.
